title: [UX] Normalize TUI dot separator to bullet
description: User reported inconsistent bullets (· vs •) between agent/tool/status output. Normalize to • for readability and consistency.

logs.msg: Implemented glyph normalization pass: replaced '·' separators with '•' in src/tui/events.rs, src/tui/render/progress.rs, src/tui/render/status.rs, and src/tui/render/selector.rs. Verified with rg sweep (no remaining middle-dot glyph in src/tui) and cargo test -q pass.
